author: blair
msg: Do a first pass at making the sample Perl script for making
incremental backups good quality Perl, use the Subversion braces

author: rooneg
msg: Fix the perl bindings build on Mac OS X.
--shlib-path-var option to determine the correct environment variable
instead of just assuming LD_LIBRARY_PATH.  remove the code that sets
LDDLFLAGS to '-shared', as it isn't right on all systems and perl will
set the correct flag for us.  Add --link-ld to our invocation of
apr_config that gives us our ldflags, as it's needed in some cases.

author: blair
msg: Add missing svnadmin subcommands, deltify and hotcopy.  Descriptions
